issue.title: Use OptGroups indicating organism in user/role selection (resource view)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In the resource view, when we have to select one or more users for a role we may end up with a list of users from multiples organisms.
We propose to use an Opt Group select for this, would be presented like:

* Organism A
** John Doe
** MyName IS
* Organism B
* Jean Dupond
* Pascal Machin

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Also apply it to diffusion view (for notified users and extraction managers (#976))
